sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The death toll in Gaza has now passed 25-thousand, according to the health ministry there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And most of them women and children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Yet Israeli officials say the fighting is likely to continue for several more months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Furthermore, almost 63-thousand Gazans have been injured, however none of the 36 hospitals are fully functional.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On Sunday, the Israeli army released a video of a tunnel in Khan Yunis, where they believe around 20 hostages had previously been held.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Israel's government is facing increasing pressure from the public to end the war and bring home the rest of the hostages, but Hamas has said it won't release any more until there's a ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Israel continues to attack, including areas in the south where it told civilians to seek refuge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But many Palestinians have ignored evacuation orders, saying nowhere feels safe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: An Israeli drone strike on a car near the southern Lebanese city of Tyre.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It killed two Hezbollah members in the vehicle and two people who were nearby, according to Lebanon's state news agency.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And as violence continues, so do calls for a ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I will not relent in my call for an immediate humanitarian ceasefire and the immediate and unconditional release of all hostages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And we must do all we can to prevent spillover of this conflict across the region, in the West Bank, across the blue line between Israel and Lebanon, and in Syria, Iraq and the Red Sea." And in a phone call on Saturday with President Biden, Netanyahu again rejected the idea of creating a Palestinian state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In Tel Aviv, thousands of protesters who no longer have any faith in his government have demanded early elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But whilst Netanyahu is under great pressure from both Israelis and internationally, he insists the war with Hamas must continue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian kamikaze drones have been repeatedly fired at Nikopol, a city in eastern Ukraine from the other side of the Dnipro River, some targeting power lines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile on Sunday, the mayor of the eastern city of Donetsk, which is occupied by Russia, said Ukraine had shelled a market, killing at least 18 people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Russian strikes on the power infrastructure this winter have not been as harmful as last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And on Saturday, Ukraine's energy minister said the power grid system has all the resources it needs to see out the winter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in Kyiv, groups of residents have received training on how to defend themselves by the municipal guard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More than 20,000 civilians have so far been trained in how to react to drone attacks and how to perform first aid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Farmers and truckers have disrupted traffic on roads near Bucharest and other cities in Romania for over a week now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Demanding lower taxes and compensation for losses caused by imports from neighbouring Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And since talks with the government have so far failed, they say their protest convoys aren't going anywhere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in Berlin on Saturday, farmers joined eco-activists saying they fully support environmentally non-genetically modified farming, but that they do need agricultural reforms and fair prices to achieve that.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And in southern France, mass protests over the past few days have forced the government to address farmers' issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: As workers set up camp and blocked motorways, they claim that the authorities' eco-transition policies make national producers uncompetitive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They say that this not only makes farms unprofitable, but it also forces people to search for products abroad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni has visited Turkey on her first international trip since Italy took the G7 presidency.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Talks with the Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan took place behind closed doors and without press.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to Italian media, Maloney has regained the support of Erdogan on limiting the migration flow from Libya.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: According to the news agency ANSA, Maloney quote thanked Erdogan for his mediation efforts in the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But the two leaders quote disagreed on the conflict in Gaza.
